name: Woodland Wanderings (WIP)
description:
This is an ongoing test of Twine's Storylet functionality. The current iteration simply runs a basic cycle through the seasons, starting on a randomised season and transitioning through the rest, pulling in random choices for players which fit the appropriate seasons. 

Future updates will: 

- Allow readers to follow particular animals and locations through the seasons, creating a greater sense of continuity

 - Add sounds and images from the BL's catalogue

-Refine the "Spring" colour scheme to make it more readable
